Name: Secret Zoo
Description: In this place, you can see a zoo with concept that has never existed before. The visitors can see various collections of animals that are placed in glass cage surround with cliffy rock. This interesting concept is capable to attract children and parents can teach them about the animal in a fun way.

Name: Balekambang Beach
Description: Looking at its contour and shape, Balekambang Beach’s contour has similar shape with Tanah Lot beach in Bali, particularly with the existence of temple above the rock in the middle of the sea. Located in southern part of Malang city, Balekambang beach is the favorite place of local people to relax

Name: Sumber Pitu Waterfall
Description: Located in Duwet Krajan village, this place allows you to enjoy the gorgeous scenery of seven waterfalls at once. According to legend, the waterfalls have magical power and sacred by the local people.

Name: Jatim Park
Description: Jawa Timur Park or more often known as Jatim Park is a well-known theme park in Malang that offers various rides, and entertainments. There are pools, science stadium, 3D theatre, Go kart area, and many more. Located in city center of Malang, Jatim Park makes a great place for children to play and learn.

Name: Angkut Museum
Description: Museum Angkut is the word of transportation in Javanese. Angkut museum is the right tourist destination where you can learn about the history of transportation and its development around the world. There is huge collection of transportation types, divided in 10 different country zones.

Name: The Batu Hotel & Villas
Description: One of our bestsellers in Batu! The Batu Villas offers a peaceful getaway in the fresh air of Batu, 300 m from Jatim Park. Featuring a restaurant, it provides modern accommodation with calming views of the surrounding greenery. Free Wi-Fi is accessible throughout the property.A 15-minute drive from The Batu Villas leads to Tirta Nirwana and Songgoriti hot springs, while Batu Night Spectacular is approximately a 20-minute dirve away. The property is a 25-minute drive from Selecta Water Park and a 45-minute drive from Abdul Rachman Saleh Airport.The non-smoking units each come with a terrace or balcony overlooking the garden or mountain. Select units offer a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Bath or shower facilities are available in the private or shared bathrooms.Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist with laundry requests and airport pick-up arrangements at additional fees.Providing room service, the restaurant specialises in Indonesian and Western favourites.

Name: Aston Inn Batu
Description: One of our bestsellers in Batu! Located in Batu, 400 m from Angkut Museum, Aston Inn Batu provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property.Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a private bathroom with free toiletries.Aston Inn Batu offers a continental or buffet breakfast.Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Jatim Park 1, Agro tourism Kusuma and Batu Townsquare. The nearest airport is Abdul Rachman Saleh, 22 km from Aston Inn Batu, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Golden Tulip Holland Resort Batu
Description: Situated in the city of Batu, 200 m from Jatim Park 2, Golden Tulip Holland Resort Batu boasts children's playground and an outdoor pool with water slides. Guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant and free WiFi can be accessed in all rooms. Free private parking is available on site.Every air-conditioned room comes with a private balcony overlooking the city, Mount Arjuna or Mount Panderman. The private bathroom is stocked with bathrobes and slippers.There is a 24-hour front desk and concierge service at the property. The staff can also assist with banquet and meeting arrangements.Jatim Park 1 is 700 m from Golden Tulip Holland Resort Batu, while Batu Night Spectacular is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Abdul Rachman Saleh Airport, 21 km from the property.
